directions: Blend mayonnaise, tuna, anchovy fillets, onion, celery, potatoes, green onion, black olives, garlic, Worcestershire sauce, salt, and hot pepper sauce in a blender until completely smooth; transfer to a bowl, cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate until chilled, at least 1 hour.
ingredients: 1 dash hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®)
title: Tapenade Le Meilleur
